summary:
HEMATOPHAGUS ET ALCHEMIE
The feeding solution for accomplished alchemists

REQUIRES DAWNGUARD.

A simple little mod to \"simplify\" blood management for fledgling vampires.
descriptionHtml:
HEMATOPHAGUS ET ALCHEMIE
The feeding solution for accomplished alchemists

REQUIRES DAWNGUARD.

A simple little mod to \"simplify\" blood management for fledgling vampires. 

Activating it while sneaking on a feed-able NPC will deposit vials of blood straight into your bag, with the possible side effect of killing your target (intentional or not). Feeding is not a crime, though killing your target certainly can be.

Launch in game and follow the ridiculously simple quest.

Possible future plans:
- Auto-injection, to never miss those feedings
- Some sort of cost (magicka, cooldown?)
author: jim
